definitions.text: the main stem of a tree; usually covered with bark; the bole is usually the part that is commercially useful for lumber
luggage consisting of a large strong case used when traveling or for storage
the body excluding the head and neck and limbs
examples: they moved their arms and legs and bodies

definitions.text: compartment in an automobile that carries luggage or shopping or tools
examples: he put his golf bag in the trunk

definitions.text: a long flexible snout as of an elephant
